revocation_event_id.description: Stable identifier for this revocation event.

target_id.description: Identifier of the artefact being revoked (consent_id or delegation_id, or other target).

principal_id.description: Identifier of the principal asserting revocation.

reason_code.description: Optional reason classification (expiry, withdrawn, superseded, misuse_detected, error).

supersedes.description: Optional pointer to a replacement artefact where revocation occurs by supersession.

notes.description: Optional notes. Avoid personal data where possible.

proof.description: Optional proof material (signatures, attestations). Intentionally unspecified at spec-first stage.
